title: What are some topics for a profile essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are some topics for a profile essay? A profile essay provides information and proper description. It combines elements of descriptive and narrative essays to give a detailed account of an individual or event. Writing a profile essay involves choosing a topic and finding out all the exciting facts about them. Here are some interesting topics for a profile essay: Football is the most amazing sport I have ever played.The fantastic life of a New York-based cabbieKobe Bryant was a god among men.Celebrating Mardi Gras in upper Los AngelesSocial media influence on world politicsTomorrowland is the place where music meets the future.Philosophy is the language of love and reason.The truth about traveling and InstagramWhat do all these topics have in common? They focus on a particular subject and the impact they have on people. It is always important to introduce the emotional element. For example, a topic about your favorite sporting activity will cover the joy of losing and the agony of defeat. Also, these topics are interesting and relevant to a large group of people. You cannot choose an essay subject no one wants to read. Moreover, you can use witty statements for your title. Puns and double entendres add an element of fun to your essay.

The best profile essay topics are interesting. They generally use people, places and events to make the essay more vivid and believable. Students may use topics like a recent block party, political gathering for event ideas. When it comes to locations, a local business, restaurant or landmark building could be interesting. Often, students choose to use buildings or stores that are new to write about. Older buildings and landmarks have generally been written about in the past, so a newer store offers the opportunity of creating a unique essay. For people-related topics, students should find someone who has an interesting background or occupation. A more interesting topic equals out to a more engaging essay.
